underlying_goal: To verify that all items from a "paper overhaul" spec file were addressed in the main paper and to fix any outstanding items.
primary_success: Claude performed a systematic audit of the paper against a response file, correctly identifying both completed and outstanding items, and then precisely implemented the user's requested fixes for the remaining issues.
brief_summary: The user asked Claude to check if all decisions from a spec file were implemented in the paper. Claude provided a detailed breakdown of addressed and pending items. The user then directed Claude to fix two outstanding writing points and create a new spec file for a pending experiment, all of which was completed successfully.
